Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence in mind. This product stands out for its unique features and unparalleled quality, making it an exceptional choice for those seeking the best. We believe it's worth more than just $150 to you, considering the value it will bring to your life or business. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $180. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the superior quality firsthand. Let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
